channel.title: Dark Bow

item.title: Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

Dark Bow will only hit once. It does a hit, then a 0 everytime. This is for PvNPC

For PvP it hits 2 times and works fine. Here is code.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && !specOn){ DDS2Damg = true; ddsInterval = 2000; lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(426); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
